definition: worn next to the skin/close-fitting/personal (servant etc)
to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: My 6-year old brother and I became her constant bodyguards.
sentences.chinese: 我和6岁的弟弟成了她的贴身保镖。
极其精致的女士贴身衬衫。

sentences.english: Lambada, a fast modern dance originally from Brazil, also named dance next to skin.
sentences.chinese: 兰巴达，源自巴西的快步现代舞，也叫贴身舞。

sentences.english: We caring of you by the usage of the wood handle to protect you.
sentences.chinese: 别具匠心的木质的把手更是给你贴身的隔热保护。

sentences.english: Truss the chicken before you roast it.
sentences.chinese: 烤鸡前先将鸡贴身扎紧。

sentences.english: The milk fibre underwear is a high-tech product with a feeling of a bosom friend.
sentences.chinese: 牛奶纤维内衣，高技术产品，贴身新感受。

sentences.english: The final close-up shot of this brooder .
Bruce Lee's two-inch punch is a famous example of this.
sentences.chinese: 李小龙的贴身发力功夫就是最好的例子。

sentences.english: This was my first month in Çréla Prabhupäda's personal service.
sentences.chinese: 这是我为圣帕布帕德做贴身服务的第一个月。

sentences.english: Shoes are inserted into the pockets through elastic bands, which secure them snugly into place.
sentences.chinese: 把鞋子插入口袋是通过橡皮筋，安全贴身鞋子进入。

sentences.english: Mme. Chiang was by now thin, glamorous and wore form-fitting clothes.
sentences.chinese: 此时的蒋夫人很瘦，光彩照人，衣着贴身。

sentences.english: Close-fitting leg has a cropped hem with elasticized binding.
sentences.chinese: 贴身的腿部剪裁下摆有弹性约束力。

sentences.english: In the material as cotton, personal warmth.
A swashbuckler who uses agility and guile to stand toe-to-toe with enemies.

sentences.english: She bought a gray flannel coat.
sentences.chinese: 我常穿法兰绒做贴身衣。

sentences.english: Please take off all metal jewellery you are wearing.
sentences.chinese: 请你将贴身的佩戴的金属饰物摘去。

definition: to (carry) on one's person/to (take) with one
